name: Place Shapes for Time
description:
Controls: 

K - Switch QWERTY/AZERTY

R- Reload level (time doesn't stop)
F - Fullscreen

QWERTY
AD/Arrows - Move
S/Down Arrow - Crouch
W/Space - Jump

AZERTY
QD/Arrows - Move
S/Down Arrow - Crouch
Z/Space - Jump

When holding shape
Left Click - Place
Right Click - Rotate
